name: spvv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), w1)
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsw(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Version of ~ spv with a disjoint variable condition, which does not require ~ ax-7 , ~ ax-12 , ~ ax-13 . (Contributed by BJ, 31-May-2019.)
